title: may 29: the story of a war memorial
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the dedication of the World War II memorial in Washington D.C., as well as the many years of planning that went into it. Afterwards, she reflects on the release of one of Lady Gaga’s most epic albums. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
